item.title: Epstein files: Latest batch from DOJ includes court records, flight logs and heavily redacted documents
item.description: The release comes amid intense scrutiny from congressional lawmakers and victims over the DOJ's handling of the Epstein files.

item.title: Greenland PM rebukes Trump special envoy overture
item.description: President Donald Trump on Sunday appointed Louisiana Gov. Jeff Landry as a "special envoy" to Greenland.

item.title: Putin ally Viktor Orbán tells CNBC using frozen Russian assets is a 'dead end'
item.description: European officials are trying to convince a handful of EU member countries to back controversial plans for providing more financial support to Ukraine...

item.title: Epstein Files: Schumer to force Senate vote on suing DOJ over partial release
item.description: President Donald Trump signed a law compelling the full release of the Jeffrey Epstein files. But the DOJ has released just a fraction.

item.title: Crypto laments loss of key ally on Capitol Hill after Lummis announces retirement
item.description: Sen. Cynthia Lummis’ retirement tees up a Republican primary in Wyoming, where the victor will be heavily favored in November.
